Instance.description: An Interaction that generates all Mixers for remixing a track at a music production station.

TunableVariant.name: remix_track_event
TunableVariant.description: If enabled, The script event to listen for from animation so we know when to mute/unmute a specific channel on the propx. If disabled, the interaction will mute/unmute channels immediately on run.

Tunable.name: Set_Script_Event
Tunable.description: The remix track event to listen for.
